DOC.brief_summary: To assess the potential of tretnoin gel 0.05% to produce phototoxic reactions, measured as skin reactions 24 and 48 hours after UV radiation of drug on skin.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Determine the Phototoxity of Atralin (Tretinoin) Gel, 0.05%
DOC.criteria: Normal healthy volunteers 18 years of age or older Less than 18 years of age
